text:
Giuliana Calandra (10 February 1936 – 25 November 2018) was an Italian actress, journalist and television presenter. She was born in Moncalieri, Italy. Calandra was known for her movie roles in "La Calandria", "Deep Red" and in "L'affittacamere".
Calandra died in Aprilia, Lazio on 25 November 2018 from leukemia at the age of 82.
